languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {uip|Damage|47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.
This effect is applied after all other effects from the attack are applied.

traits.locale_text:
All Executioner melee attack apply Bleed effect on the targets with strength of {uip|Damage|47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}.
This effect applies after all other effects applied by the weapon.

The Executioner's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} apply bleeding ({uip|Damage|47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}) to all targets hit.
This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} is applied after all other {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} of the attack are applied.

This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} is applied after all other {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} from the attack are applied.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で、{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}したすべてのターゲットにレベル{uip|Damage|47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}の{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}を付与できる。
この効果は、攻撃による他の効果すべてが適用された後に適用される。
